task.title: Adding a Child Note
task.shortdesc: Add a child note to an existing item in the library.

step.cmd: Select an item in the center pane
Click the "New Note" button on the top of the center pane

step.info: Text in notes will automatically save as you type.

taskbody.result: A note will be created as an attachment to the item, and a note editor will appear in the right-hand pane.
